description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Caledonia described by Scott, Burns and Ramsay. [Selections from their poetical works.] With illustrations by John Macwhirter, etc", "Appendix. Miscellaneous" Contributor: MACWHIRTER, John. Author: Scotland Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 11602.h.4." Page: 231 Place of Publishing: London & Edinburgh Date of Publishing: 1878 Publisher: W. P. Nimmo Issuance: monographic Identifier: 003313351 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
